doc.long_description:
For example:

Input: num = 10101 (21)
remove_bit(num, 2): output = 1001 (9)
remove_bit(num, 4): output = 101 (5)
remove_bit(num, 0): output = 1010 (10)
doc.short_description: Remove_bit(num, i): remove a bit at specific position.
doc.full:
Remove_bit(num, i): remove a bit at specific position.
For example:

Input: num = 10101 (21)
remove_bit(num, 2): output = 1001 (9)
remove_bit(num, 4): output = 101 (5)
remove_bit(num, 0): output = 1010 (10)

remove_bit.source_code:
def remove_bit(num, i):
    mask = num >> i + 1
    mask = mask << i
    right = (1 << i) - 1 & num
    return mask | right
